title: The News Dissector
content:
Preview of new RadiOWS program, produced by Polarity1 and an OWS working group,  and discussion of recent Occupy Wall… Street developments with Occupy activist Cat Watters.
Second half hour: “Occupy The Kremlin”–discussion of developments in Russia with Professor David Kotz of the University of Massachusetts, co-author of “From Gorbachev to Putin” and a pre-recorded interview with Boris Kagarlitsky, Director of the Institute for Globalization and Social Movements in Moscow.
